item.description:
Hi Trailblazers, come join us for a fun night of dancing and singing. Come early to grab a table and a seat as we listen and sing along with the Jumbo Circus Peanuts. My cell # is 603-312-6735 if anyone get's lost or is coming late. See you there. Peter

Tired of all the crass commercialism? The cheapening of the season by all the marketeers? Or just looking to renew your love of humanity along with others who share your values? Well, what you need is to come down and get trashed and sing Christmas carols with your personal extended family, the Jumbo Circus Peanuts. This annual tradition is both a spectacle and a deeply moving metaphysical phenomenon. Yours for a modest door charge. Doors at 8, music at 9.

group.name: Trailblazers- A Seacoast Singles Meetup Group

item.name: Old-Fashioned Xmas 'w the Nuts
